import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

You can use the SDK to send transaction with funds that have to be claimed (for example a
[micro transaction](send-micro-transaction.mdx)). This guide will show you how to claim all claimable outputs in an account.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve all claimable outputs in the account by calling the [`Wallet.claimable_outputs()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.claimable_outputs)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.rs#L34
```

</div>

3. Claim the outputs by calling the [`Wallet.claim_outputs()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.claim_outputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.rs#L40
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.rs#L43-L45
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve all claimable outputs in the account by calling the [`Wallet.claimableOutputs()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#claimableoutputs)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.ts#L38
```

</div>

3. Claim the outputs by calling the [`Wallet.claimOutputs()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#claimoutputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.ts#L44
```

</div>

4. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.ts#L47
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve all claimable outputs in the account by calling the [`Wallet.claimable_outputs()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#claimable_outputs)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.py#L25
```

</div>

3. Claim all the outputs in the account by calling the [`Wallet.claim_outputs()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#claim_outputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/claim_transaction.py#L31
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/advanced_transaction.py#L51-L52
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
